Representative enzymes: E. coli AmpC, P99, ACT-1, CMY-2, FOX-1, MIR-1

Defining hydrolysis spectrum characteris: oxyimino-beta lactams plus  resistance to BLI
Increased hydrolysis of carbenicillin, cefepime, and cefpirome
Increased hydrolysis of cloxacillin or oxacillin
Inhibited by clavulanic acid but not aztreonam
